alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:25PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 415 PM MST... At 325 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cashion to 7 miles southwest of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Gila Bend, Laveen, Cashion, Estrella, Litchfield Park, South Phoenix, Cotton Center, Arizona State Fairgrounds, Liberty, South Mountain Park, Camelback Mountain, Sky Harbor Airport, Estrella Mountain Park and Estrella Mountain Ranch. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 123 and 151. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 104 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert
